document_data.name: House Gheldieg
document_data.mainbody: '''House Gheldieg''' was an [[Amn]]ian noble house originating from the [[Gildeggh]] family of Lord-Magister [[Lhorar Gildeggh]] of [[Waterdeep]]. The family was exiled and came to Amn, marrying into its families and gradually transforming into the Gheldieg family. Its power was eventually controlled by [[House Tanislove]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Ashtha Gheldieg]] of [[Eshpurta]], a customer of [[Mystic Carrion]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
* [[Vyma Gheldieg]], daughter of Curkon and wife of [[Pehllus Tanislove]].
* [[Curkon Gheldieg]], former Namarch on the [[Council of Six]] and lord of the house.
